data.title: Busy, popular place
data.text: We went on a Friday night (and a holiday), it was so busy.  It was a 55 minute wait for a table of 5.  The staff was friendly.  Food was good.  Always love spinach artichoke.  Waitress didn't come back to refill our water glasses though. If the waitress doesn't mention buying a gift card, you get a free dessert ( it's advertised on the table menu cards), which we asked her about.  She seemed disappointed that we noticed.  The free dessert was a small slice of brownie and a scoop of ice cream.  Nice ending to our meal.

data.title: Fun crowd & friendly staff, so it's easy to fit in
data.text: The whole restaurant has been recently remodeled - excellent site lines to the multiple television sets, but the best part is that the bar area is opened up.  The menu changes regularly (every few months), so it's hard to recommend items beyond the normal comfort foods - ribs, boneless wings, etc.  Their happy hour specials are an easy way to get some tasty bites without going full force for a meal. Their beers on tap are currently good, as the Sam Adams Oktoberfest is on tap.  They usually DON'T have a good darker beer on tap, so it's nice when there is one. Parking is easy at the big lot next to the theater, but on the weekends it may be tougher.  There's a lot to do in this part of Alhambra, and Applebee's is close to everything, so it's an excellent starting/meeting point.

data.title: Accomadating staff.
data.text: Party of 6 three adults and three children, needed high chairs for them. Staff helped us situate high chairs in the space we were given. Kept us up dated on our orders and brought them all at the same time. Asked if we required any more plates or silverware. Very pleasant staff!

data.title: Service was not good !!
data.text: Took my wife there on a regular day for dinner , we were hosted to the table without wait . Order our food and appetizer to start with , the waitress brought out food and no plate to eat it with , that I has to asked for the plate to eat our food lol. and the whole time we were there the service was lousy . May be we don't have the same colors of skin ?? . By the way food was ok .

data.title: Always good at Applebee's
data.text: The Applebee's was a good place to eat, for a variety of food. The waitress was very helpful and kind.The food came out quite quick and was very good.

data.title: Food was OK, service well that was something else
data.text: This was my first time to an Applebee's, only because I had a gift card. My daughter and I went on a weekday late afternoon. The food options were okay, nothing to be excited about. The server kept asking if we were ok every 5 minutes. Please let me eat in peace! It almost seemed like he was flirting. Then the manager walked around also asked if everything was okay. OVERKILL!! This may work during busy hours, but not when it isn't. Will I be going back? No.

data.title: Another Great Meal
data.text: Another great meal at Applebee's.  I had the 2 for $24 meal with a friend and had boneless chicken wings for an appetizer and then a large portion of double crunch shrimp with a baked potato.  A fantastic meal.  Our server was excellent and took good care of us.

data.title: Bom para um Happy hour
data.text: O Applebee's é muito bom para um happy hour, em família.  Excelentes opções de cerveja bem gelada e de pratos de entrada sem pagar muito por isso.  O ambiente é típico de um American Sports Bar, com TVs de jogos, bem descontraído e animado.

data.title: Sympa
data.text: Bon choix pas cher . Copieux et original , sauf la soupe à l'oignon, pas correct.  Ouvert jusque tard.

data.title: Excelente refeição
data.text: Nuna havia ido em um restaurante da rede Applebees`s e me surpreendi. O atendimento é muito bom, os preços são acessíveis e fica bem localizado em Alhambra. Recomendo uma parada no local.
